title: nAda praNava
sahitya:
nAda praNava vadivam jagamE nALum paNiya aDaivOm sukhamE svaralaya


anupallavi

  Oda nIrk-kaDalin OnkAra nAdam uyar paravai gItamuDan bindu kalA


caraNam    yogiyar samAdhi nilaiyuDan nADum uyirgaLin uLLum puramum ADum
nAgamum maNi viri paDam eduttADum nambum anbar inbamODu pADum
